entry.title: too busy being yours to fall for someone new
entry.summary:
Author: auguststarchaser

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,470Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 114

Summary: “Don’t want to be alone,” Dick admits, eyes dropping to the ground in shame. “I’m sorry.”And while Jason had been able to resist his seducing words a few times, he’d never really managed Dick’s vulnerable ones. The two of them stand in silence for a moment, just waiting for the other to make a move. Jason’s hesitant, afraid to open the can of works he’d so desperately tried to hold back.“That doesn’t mean you come here, Dick,” Jason says finally. “Fuck, we talked about this already.”“Just wanted to go home.” Or where Dick and Jason have never been good at letting each other go.

entry.title: Tired Stars
entry.summary:
Author: ResidentJazz

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,618Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 329

Summary: Dick Grayson has always known how to smile on command, how to play the part people expect — even when it tears him apart. After a public breakdown and a mission that pushes him past his limits, Bruce’s disappointment feels like another verdict he can’t escape. But Jason refuses to let him spiral alone.In the quiet of a safe house, between coffee that tastes like ash, late-night movies, and the weight of a case too close to home, Dick has to confront the question he’s never dared to ask: who is he when he isn’t what Bruce made him?One step at a time, he’ll have to find out.

entry.title: I Wanna Be Your Provider
entry.summary:
Author: kitnotkat95

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,365Chapters: 4/7Kudos: 63

Summary: Dick and Slade have been together for years, Slade being Dick's daddy so he could brat it up to his hearts content, blowing off steam from the pressure of being the whole damn Justice League's golden boy. Not long after Jason returns and he's got more than enough of his own shit to work through, Dick decides he needs a daddy too, and he tells Slade he's pretty sure he's supposed to be Jason's daddy like Slade was for him. Dick thinks that what Jason needs is to learn, like he did, that it can feel good to have someone put you in your place. Slade doesn't necessarily agree with either of these trains of thought, but sometimes with Dick the only way out is through and from what Slade could see Dick was at least close enough on both counts that Jason agrees to try.

entry.title: Glass Rain
entry.summary:
Author: soaring_bubblegum

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 119,882Chapters: 24/42Kudos: 989

Summary: Jason Todd wakes up in the wrong Gotham.Here, he stayed dead. Here, his death broke his family so completely they became the monsters they once fought. Dick Grayson haunts the skyline with wings and talons, Barbara Gordon moves like a spider made of shadow, and something that might have once been Batman rules from a corrupted cave.The city is quarantined, the air tastes of ozone and old blood, and Jason should be running.Instead, he finds himself drawn to the creature that was once his brother—the one stalking him through twisted streets with eyes that still burn with something almost human.Some hunts, it turns out, go both ways.

entry.title: Build Your Own Disaster
entry.summary:
Author: abetheman22

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 73,696Chapters: 5/15Kudos: 642

Summary: Dick finds himself opening the back passenger door and climbing in like he is a man possessed. “I knew you’d be fine! B was the one freaking out, I was like ‘dude, he’s Nightwing, he’ll be fine!’ but B’s B, ya know-” Robin is saying, his words running together in his excitement, (“I’m right here,” Bruce mutters, but both boys ignore him). “-and then he told me to wait in the batmobile in case he needed a surprise back up, y’know, and-” the boy cuts himself off abruptly, turning to look at Dick more clearly. “Are you naked?”Dick smiles sheepishly at Robin before nodding, “Yeah, I dunno why they always wanna strip me. Seems like it’s just more work for them, but y'know, I’m not one to judge.” Robin seems to find himself unable to speak as he just nods slowly, eyes worryingly wide and face bright tomato red. “You okay?” He asks, reaching up to touch the boy’s shoulder.“Sit forward in your seat, Robin,” Bruce sighs. AKA, Dick and Jason's relationship through the years.Rewritten as of 10/02/2025. Update upcoming!

Summary: After presenting as a Sub Tim wasn’t sure what his plan in life would be. Then a night of networking turned into catching the attention of Batman and his sons, and Tim couldn’t say no to the job of being their live in sub.
